text: Madhusudan () is another name of Vishnu or God and is the 73rdVishnu Sahasranamam name in the Vishnu sahasranama. According to Adi Sankara' s commentary on the Vishnu sahasranama, Madusudanah means the destroyer of the demon Madhu. ==References== Cited from Sri Vishnu Sahasranama, commentary by Sri Sankaracharya, translated by Swami Tapasyananda, available at Sri Ramakrishna Math, Chennai; available at an Indian web site and a US site. Category:Names of Vishnu
title: Madhusudanah
